item.description:
I'm still in the process of my move to Northern Vermont and I don't have all my fancy computers and software for photos and links set up ... but my friend Ed and I are planning to hike the Mahoosuc Notch (the "hardest mile on the AT") and Old Speck on Saturday!  

Our plan is to meet at the end of the hike at Grafton Notch at 8 a.m., then drive around to the start of the hike on Success Pond Road.  The thru-hike is eight miles, about 2,500 feet elevation gain ... not a hard hike but the terrain will be tough!  You can find my trip planner by CLICKING HERE and then click on the tab at the far bottom-right of the page labeled "Notch Trail-Rt.26 Thru-Hike."

You can find more information about the areas we'll be traveling by Googling "Mahoosuc Notch" and "Old Speck (ME)."  I will reschedule in the event of bad weather.  See you there!

Julie, Ed and Mike.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my green Honda Element ...
item.name: Old Speck and the Mahoosuc Notch!
